name: INFLUXIS
description:
Influxis is an underwater single player survival and exploration game. You start stranded on an alien planet, but by managing ressource collection and crafting more advanced tools, you are able to survive and explore deeper in search of new ressources and answers. This is a simple survival exploration game ment to take the player across the wonders and complexities that an alien aquatic world has to offer. So take a deep dive !
- The only features available for now are ressource collection, crafting, survival and exploration. It is an offline singleplayer game.
